description.brief: Many to many sigslot comms with thread safety and posix style naming

package.description: Provides a signal/slot mechanism (in the same vein as qt sigslots, boost::signals etc. for intra-process communication. These include some improvements - they do not need a preprocessor, are fully type safe, allow for simple connections via a posix style string identifier and are multithread-safe.
package.author: Daniel Stonier
